  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommsTask  
    CommsTask.AdEngineOperation
    Specifies a marketing engine operation, in which a campaign and a set of ad groups are matched to a user's profile, and enqueued for transmission if targeting parameters don't exclude their profile.
    CommsTask.AdEngineOperation.Builder
    Specifies a marketing engine operation, in which a campaign and a set of ad groups are matched to a user's profile, and enqueued for transmission if targeting parameters don't exclude their profile.
    CommsTask.SendOperation
    Send a batch of either SMS or email messages.
    CommsTask.SendOperation.Builder
    Send a batch of either SMS or email messages.
    CommsTask.TriggerOperation
    Specifies an operation to merge campaign targeting parameters and trigger execution.
    CommsTask.TriggerOperation.Builder
    Specifies an operation to merge campaign targeting parameters and trigger execution.
    EmailComms  
    EmailComms.EmailBatch
    Specifies the structure of a batch of email transmission operations.
    EmailComms.EmailBatch.Builder
    Specifies the structure of a batch of email transmission operations.
    EmailComms.EmailContent
    Specifies email content for a given ad group.
    EmailComms.EmailContent.Builder
    Specifies email content for a given ad group.
    EmailComms.EmailMessage
    Specifies the structure of an individual email message.
    EmailComms.EmailMessage.Builder
    Specifies the structure of an individual email message.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata
    Specifies schema-based metadata appended to a message.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.Builder
    Specifies schema-based metadata appended to a message.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.GoToTrack
    Specifies the structure of an attached One-Click action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.GoToTrack.Builder
    Specifies the structure of an attached One-Click action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.GoToView
    Specifies the structure of an attached go-to action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.GoToView.Builder
    Specifies the structure of an attached go-to action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.OneClickAction
    Specifies the structure of an attached One-Click action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.OneClickAction.Builder
    Specifies the structure of an attached One-Click action.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.OrderMetadata
    Specifies the structure of attached order metadata.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.OrderMetadata.Builder
    Specifies the structure of attached order metadata.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.SchemaBlock
    Individual block of schema-based metadata.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.SchemaBlock.Builder
    Individual block of schema-based metadata.
    EmailComms.EmailSender
    Specifies an email sender record.
    EmailComms.EmailSender.Builder
    Specifies an email sender record.
    EmailComms.EmailSettings
    Email-specific settings.
    EmailComms.EmailSettings.Builder
    Email-specific settings.
    EmailComms.EmailTransmission
    Specifies the structure of a transmission operation for an individual email message.
    EmailComms.EmailTransmission.Builder
    Specifies the structure of a transmission operation for an individual email message.
    EmailComms.PublisherMetadata
    Specifies information about the publisher of an action.
    EmailComms.PublisherMetadata.Builder
    Specifies information about the publisher of an action.
